data.name: InvalidDefaultValueMap
data.value: TF61000: The converter could not convert work item {0}. The field '{1}' has an unsupported value '{2}', and the default value is also not supported. Check the value mappings and default values in the field map file '{3}'. Please provide a valid default value and run the converter again to migrate the work item.

data.name: InvalidFieldMapReference
data.value: TF61001: Unable to start migration. File {0} contains unsupported attribute value '{1}' for 'refer'. Only 'UserMap' value is supported for this attribute. Run the converter again after fixing the attribute value.

data.name: InvalidFieldName
data.value: TF61002: Unable to start migration. Field Map validation failed for file '{0}'. Field(s) '{1}' does not exist in work item type '{2}' in Team Foundation Server. Please create these fields in your work item type or remove the fields from the field map file.

data.name: InvalidProject
data.value: TF61004: Unable to start migration. The converter could not find the team project '{0}' on the Team Foundation Server '{1}'. Please provide the name of an existing team project or create the team project and try again.

data.name: NullDefaultValueMap
data.value: TF61008: The converter could not convert work item '{0}'. The field '{1}' has an unsupported value '{2}', and there is no default value specified in the field map file '{3}'. Please provide a default value and try again.

data.name: ValidatingVSTSFieldsStart
data.value: Validating the Team Foundation fields in the converter mappings

data.name: VstsConnectionStart
data.value: Connecting to the Team Foundation Server [Server: {0}, Team Project: {1}]

data.name: VstsSchemaImporting
data.value: Provisioning work item type '{0}' in Team Foundation

data.name: VstsInvalidUsers
data.value: TF61009: Unable to start migration. The User Map file '{0}' contains unrecognized Team Foundation users. Check that the users specified in the User Map file are all existing Team Foundation users or remove them from the User Map file. Unrecognized users: {1}

data.name: VstsValidatingUsers
data.value: Validating users in Team Foundation.

data.name: VstsAttachmentLinkHistory
data.value: Updated by converter for creating Attachments and Links

data.name: VstsWITProvisionFailed
data.value: TF61013: Unable to start migration. The converter could not provision the work item type specified in the file {0} because of the following error: {1}. Please fix the source of the error and try again.

data.name: VstsWITValidationFailed
data.value: TF61014: Unable to start migration. The converter could not provision the work item type specified in the file {0} because of the following error at Line: {1} Col: {2}: Error: {3}. Please fix the source of the error and try again.

data.name: VstsAttachmentUploadFailed
data.value: TF61015: Attachment '{0}' save failed for work item '{1}' with the following error: {2}. Please fix the source of the error and run the converter again to get that attachment.

data.name: VstsUserNotInServiceAccounts
data.value: TF61016: Unable to start migration. User '{0}' is not a member of 'Service Accounts' group. It is required for the user running converter to be part of 'Service Accounts' security group."

data.name: VstsCannotEditFields
data.value: Cannot edit field '{0}' as is a internal core field in Team Foundation Work Item Tracking system.

data.name: VstsWitMismatch
data.value: TF61018: Unable to start migration. The name of the work item speficied in definition file '{0}' does not match with the TargetWIT '{1}' in the schema map file '{2}'. Please update the WORKITEMTYPE node of the corresponding work item type definition file or the TargetWIT attribute in the schema map file so that both are the same and try running the converter again.

data.name: VstsNoWitd
data.value: TF61019: Unable to start migration. The Work Item Type Definition file '{0}' specified in schema map file '{1}' is invalid. It does not contain root element 'WITD'. Please create a valid file by referring to the file schema in the help documents and try again.

data.name: VstsNoWorkItemType
data.value: TF61020: The Work Item Type Definition file '{0}' specified in schema map file '{1}' is invalid. It does not contain element 'WORKITEMTYPE' under 'WITD' node. Please create a valid file by referring to the file schema in the help documents and try again.

data.name: VstsNoNameAttribute
data.value: TF61021: The Work Item Type Definition file '{0}' specified in schema map file '{1}' is invalid. It does not contain 'name' attribute under 'WORKITEMTYPE\WITD' node. Please create a valid file by referring to the file schema in the help documents and try again.

data.name: VstsInvalidXmlFile
UsingDefaultValue
data.value: Using: '{0}' instead of: '{1}' for: '{2}'

data.name: WISaveFailed
data.value: Work Item could not be saved due to following error: {0}

data.name: WarningFieldTruncated
data.value: Truncating field '{0}', from '{1}' to '{2}'

data.name: SerializingWSFailed
data.value: TF61025: Unable to serialize object due to unknown error: {0}

data.name: ErrorBisMiddleTierNotRegistered
data.value: TF26176: Team Foundation could not find the registration for the application server URL. Contact your Team Foundation Server administrator.

data.name: InvalidStructureNode
data.value: Invalid structure node.
